title: A Game for the Hesitant Bride: A Trial of Hooks and Ginger
description: Everything that has transpired since Lady Emma's intimately spicy wedding night has been leading her to one place.... Every depraved act–from her daily dose of ginger to her regular visits to her husband's pillory–has been preparing her for a single trial... In the deepest reaches of the House of Silk–London's most secretive and debauched gentlemen's club–is a stage on which women can play a special game. All they must do is submit to Madame Silk and her devilish instruments without surrendering to pleasure. A simple ask... yet countless girls have sought the great prize that comes with victory and none have succeeded... Now Lady Emma must follow her husband into the den of iniquity and try her hand at the great game. The rules of Edmund's estate may have been designed with this contest in mind, but not even his debauched training can truly prepare Emma for the dark delights she'll learn as she wriggles on Madame Silk's hook... But Emma must succeed where so many have failed... for time is running short and only by winning can she grant the dying wish of the woman both she and Edmund love...
author: Cecelie Hart
